Discontinuing Benefits in VBMS-A When the Veteran Will Return to Active Duty on a Date That Is in the Future
VBMS-A currently lacks the functionality to discontinue benefits from a future effective date.Â  Until this functionality is added, claims processors must use the workaround described in the table below to discontinue benefits from a future effective date in VBMS-A.
Step
Action
1
Select
Return to Active Duty
from the drop-down box in the DECISION field on the BASIC ELIGIBILITY tab.
2
Enter the current date in the EVENT DATE field.
3
Enter the effective date for the (future) discontinuation of benefits in the AWARD EFFECTIVE DATE field.
4
Generate the award (discontinuation).
5
Use Personal Computer Generated Letters (instead of Redesigned Automated Decision Letters) to prepare a decision notice.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 2, Section B  - Award Adjustments Necessitated by a Veteran's Return to and Discharge From Active Duty
